column1: #Text=First of all the FN popuation has nothing to do with India so I would switch up the vocab.
#Text=The only place they are called Indian is in legislation which is grossly outdated.
#Text=Secondly since the last residential school closed in 1996 there are a lot of current parents who were impacted either directly or indirectly by the system.
#Text=Would you say the slavery exceuse is running thin?
#Text=Because it shows a lack of awareness of the impact of intergenerational trauma and the challenges it causes on the community.
